name: Car Sumo!!!
description:
A game where two players fight while avoiding: infinite passing cars, stacks of boxes, barriers, and other obstacles! 

When a player defeats its opponent, the map will reset and the winning player will recieve a point. 

CONTROLS: 

P1: 

WASD = moving 

q = changing view 

p2: 

arrows = moving 

enter = changing view 

r= reset scores!
